title: 65A.06 MOTOR VEHICLE, OCEAN AND INLAND MARINE POLICIES.
text: Insurance on automobiles, motorcycles, other motor vehicles, or on property insured by ocean marine, and inland marine policies as defined by section 70A.03, clause (3), against loss or damage by fire, when combined in one policy with insurance against one or more of the other hazards mentioned in section 60A.06, subdivision 1, clause (1), need not be in accordance with section 65A.01, but in no event shall this section be applicable to insurance on buildings or structures.
